events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because it is not what I paid for.
The case was reviewed and categorized under Refund based on the customer's request regarding money back.
The refund team agent has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you received the wrong item and need a refund. I’m here to help you with that.
Can you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number so we can process your refund quickly?
Here are the photos of the wrong item I got, and my order number is 12345. Please let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited back within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I’m glad this can be resolved smoothly.
The refund process has been completed on our end. Please check your payment method in a few days for the refund.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was confirmed received and no further issues were reported, the case is now closed. Thank you for your patience.
